result.execSummary:
All charges against Christopher D Veasy in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Christopher D Veasy is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Megan Marie Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
 On the state's motion, Court orders case dismissed without prejudice.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report dated 02-01-2016 received and filed.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Paul Hauer on behalf of Megan Marie Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Case set for projected plea and sentencing heraing. ADA Williamson is in jury trial on another matter, in another court. Off the record discussion. Case adjourned for projected plea hearing on 02-02-2016 at 1:30 pm, branch 17.  Plea hearing scheduled for February 2, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Megan Marie Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE. Off the record discussion. Court cancelled warrant. Court address positive drug test. Court admonishes Defendant.  Case calendared for  plea and sentencing on 01-29-2016 at 8:30 am in Branch 17.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report dated 11-16-2015 received and filed.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.
Court ordered any signature bond forfeited subject to notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office and recompense (to be determined at close of case).

NO APPEARANCES.
Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court to address Justice Point Violation Report filed on today in Branch 17.  Defendant tested postive for THC at 10-30-15 JusticePoint office visit.  Defendant absconded upon being instructed to report to Branch 17 forthwith.  

The Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued with REMAND to Judge.

NOTE:  11-17-15 Scheduling Conference date REMAINS.
Court will address violation report filed on 11-02-2015 for hearing on 11-05-2015 at 1:30 pm.

Milwaukee County Pretrial Services Violation Report: Drug Test- Posititve, Missed Office Contact, received and filed. tk 
Court is reviewing report.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court.  Attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter not present, contacted court prior to case being called.  Megan Marie Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin via telephone.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Scheduling conference held off the record.
ADA Williamson is in trial on another matter in another court and requests another scheduling conference date.  Defense counsel does not object.  Court ordered case adjourned for scheduling conference on 11/17/15 at 8:30 am, Branch 17.  Scheduling conference scheduled for November 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services pretrial report dated October 28, 2015 received and filed.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Case set for jury trial. Off the record discussion. State is not prepared to proceed today and request a scheduling conference. Defense does not object. Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 10-29-2015 at 1:30 pm, branch 17.  Scheduling conference scheduled for October 29, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report dated October 9, 2015 received and filed. tk
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report dated 9-22-2015, received and filed. tk

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
 Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Held off the record. Final pretrial held. Case remains scheduled for jury trial on 10-12-2015 at 9:00 am, branch 17.

Court orders defendant RELEASED to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription, no drug paraphernalia and no alcohol.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
In chambers discussion placed on the record.   Defense counsel requests case be set for Final Pretrial and Jury Trial. Any motions due no later than 07-02-2015 by 5:00 pm. Felony Pretrial Scheduling Order, signed and filed.  Copies given to state and defense counsel.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference on 09-23-2015 at 01:30 pm, and Jury Trial scheduled on 10-12-2015 at 9:00 am, Branch 17.  Parties notified that effective August 1, 2015, Branch 17 will be located in the Safety Building, room 310.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for October 12, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Calendar call scheduled for July 2, 2015 at 05:00 pm.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case scheduled for plea and sentencing.  State informs the Court that the report from the DNA analysis is not yet available. Defense counsel requests more time in order to review the report once received. Case adjourned to Branch 17.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for Plea and Sentencing. Sidebar held prior to the case being called. Court makes a record of the sidebar. Case is adjourned for projected Plea and Sentencing on 6-19-2015 at 8:30 a.m., Br. 17.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Held off the record. Case set for plea hearing. Court is in jury trial on another matter. Case adjourned for projected plea and sentencing hearing in Branch 17.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
At the request of the Defense the case is adjourned for Projected Plea Hearing on 4-15-2015 at 8:30 a.m., Br. 17. Any Defense motion is due no later than 4-15-2015 at 8:30 a.m. Calendar call scheduled for April 15, 2015 at 08:30 am. Plea hearing scheduled for April 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Case scheduled for Scheduling Conference on 2-16-2015 at 1:30 p.m., Br. 17 is down. Case is rescheduled for Scheduling Conference on 2-26-2015 at 8:30 a.m., Br. 17. 
Parties notified via telephone.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Defendant Christopher D Veasy in custody.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pleads not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY; no possession of any weapons or firearms; no possession of any illegal drugs without a valid prescription.

Defendant Christopher D Veasy in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17. Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. Case is adjourned for a Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 1/29/15 @ 1:30pm
